description:
Bring your A-game to every training session. This ultralight and breathable hoodie adds a layer of warmth and wicking so you stay focused on your workout, not your clothing.

  • Stretchy recycled polyester with AirVent™ wicking technology keeps you comfortable and dry while working hard
  • Fabric has ActiveFresh™ antimicrobial treatment to resist odours
  • 3-panel hood fits close to the head
  • Set-in sleeves provide unrestricted range of motion
  • Thumb holes hold sleeves in place
  • Flatlock sleeves for chafe-free wear
name: Outdoor Research Echo Printed Hoodie - Men's
